root: ^You're reading a random magazine you found in the bathroom earlier.
^You've reached the zodiac page... Time to see how the week is gonna go...
^Not that you believe it, it's more like you find it fun... Also, when has a little bit of orientation ever hurt anyone?

Pepper_Choice_Yes: ^As for Sagittarius, you get the insight that you probably should be avoiding stairs.
^Very Interesting... Let's hope the building's elevator doesn't break down.
Pepper_Choice_No: ^As for Sagittarius, you get the insight that you probably should be avoiding stairs.
^Very Interesting... Let's hope the building's elevator doesn't break down.

c-1: ^You lift your eyes from the magazine and look at Alex. In truth, you chose bell peppers only because you knew Alex would be annoyed by them.
^Not that bell peppers on pizza are bad...

b: ^ From a scale of 0 to pepperoni, Bell peppers on pizza is probably a 6, a 4.5 at a minimum.
^ From a scale of 0 to pepperoni, Bell peppers on pizza is probably a 6, a 4.5 at a minimum.

c-2: ^Alex doesn't press you on the matter.

N2: ^You lift your eyes from the magazine and look at Alex.
^Bell peppers on pizza are not bad...

b: ^ From a scale of 0 to pepperoni, Bell peppers on pizza is probably 6, a 4.5 at a minimum.
^ From a scale of 0 to pepperoni, Bell peppers on pizza is probably 6, a 4.5 at a minimum.

N3: ^Next time I'll let you pick the toppings.
^Just pick them out of the slices...
^Don't be such a baby about it!

c-0: ^The look Alex gives you next is worrisome. You may come to regret this decision.

b: ^ Alex does as you suggested, but with a resentful expression. You were just trying to be helpful.
^ Alex does as you suggested, but with a resentful expression. You were just trying to be helpful.

c-1: ^Alex says nothing and you decide to drop the subject.

N4: ^You know that Alex is a Pisces so you take a quick peek at that horoscope.
^'Eat more vegetables' it advises... And you find that very appropriate.
^You start to wonder about other friends to check their horoscope. You look up at Alex.
^Alex nods slowly, realization slowly downing on
^Your eyes lock on each other for a fraction of a second. Sparks seem to fly. You both look down.
^Yeah, last year you picked a gift 30 minutes before the party.
^And because of that, Claire didn't really like your gift.
^But Alex always puts a lot of effort into the gifts
^Could it be that you're not the only one that forgot?
N6: ^You nod at Alex and try to appear unbothered by it.
^At least this time you have time to think about a gift. Maybe you and Alex could team-up.
^You could both get a gift together or somehow two gifts that complement each other.

b: ^ Maybe you should consider getting more mature friends.
^ Maybe you should consider getting more mature friends.

N6: ^You and Alex exchange a look. Claire is a known chocoholic. Unfortunately, there's no chocolate in sight!
^She's been improving at a very fast pace.
^Eventually, one by one, you all retire to bed to rest for a couple of hours.
